properties.Name: HoldReason
properties.Description:
The reason why a Hold is initiated on an Order or Order Line Item.

Ex:
- quality defects
- lack of product
- transportation problem
- manufacturing defects

Columns.Name: HoldReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Hold Reason.

Columns.Name: HoldReasonName
Columns.Description: The name of a Hold Reason.

Columns.Name: HoldReasonDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Hold Reason.
